function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of consideration for biophilic design in built environment","Impact":"Reduced physical, mental, and behavioral benefits, increased risk of disease propagation","Mitigation":"Include biophilic design principles in the design of built environment, emphasize the use of natural elements and patterns","Technologies":"Biophilic design software, natural materials and textures, green infrastructure","People":"Residents, visitors, and community members","Owner":"Architects, developers, and urban planners"},{"Description":"Inadequate covid-19 prevention measures in apartment units","Impact":"Higher risk of covid-19 transmission, potential outbreak in apartment units","Mitigation":"Implement concrete and measurable steps for covid-19 prevention in the design of apartment units, consider ventilation, sanitation, and spatial configuration","Technologies":"Smart ventilation systems, antimicrobial surfaces, spatial planning software","People":"Residents, visitors, and community members","Owner":"Architects, developers, and property managers"},{"Description":"Failure to consider the impact of spatial configuration on disease propagation","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission, compromised health and well-being of residents","Mitigation":"Evaluate and optimize spatial configurations to minimize crowding and promote airflow, incorporate spatial distancing measures","Technologies":"3D spatial modeling, airflow simulation software, space utilization analytics","People":"Residents, visitors, and community members","Owner":"Architects, developers, and health officials"}]}
